titleStmt.title: Devotions for the helpe and assistance of all Christian people in all occasions and necessities.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
Hatton, Christopher Hatton, Baron, 1605-1670.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Devotions for severall occasions.
Variously attributed to Jeremy Taylor and Christopher Hatton.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
